episodes.synopsis: Steven Karp's first day of college is rather eventful: he sleeps with a girl named Lizzie and finds out his parents are getting divorced.
episodes.title: Prototype

episodes.synopsis: Lizzie tells Steven that she has a boyfriend, but he does his best to win her affection anyway. The head RA, Hillary, has a crush on Lloyd.
episodes.title: So You Have a Boyfriend?

episodes.synopsis: Lizzie's boyfriend, Eric, comes to visit. Steven convinces her to break up with Eric, but feels guilty and helps Eric win her back.
episodes.title: Eric Visits

episodes.synopsis: Steven is forced to get a job in the cafeteria to help pay his tuition until Hal finds "the right job".
episodes.title: Jobs, Jobs, Jobs

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to impress Rachel, Marshall uses natural remedies she gives him when he gets ill. Steven's getting fed up with sleeping in the rec room.
episodes.title: Sick in the Head

episodes.synopsis: Adam Sandler holds a concert at UNEC, then hangs out at Steven's floor afterwards. Rachel hooks up with Adam's assistant, and Adam woos Lizzie.
episodes.title: The Assistant

episodes.synopsis: Ron and Lloyd invest in a stock that rises then quickly drops. Steven, Lizzie and Rachel pay a druggie to do their papers, but he fails to deliver.
episodes.title: Addicts

episodes.synopsis: A fellow student convinces Steven to accept the Lord, while a professor makes Lloyd believe that everything is meaningless.
episodes.title: God Visits

episodes.synopsis: When his parents visit, Marshall has to tell them he's majoring in music, not business. Rachel's mom finds a stash of "bad" things in a stuffed frog.
episodes.title: Parents' Weekend

episodes.synopsis: Eric discovers that Lizzie cheated on him with Steven, and heads to UNEC to get his revenge. Lloyd helps Steven prepare for a fistfight.
episodes.title: Eric Visits Again

episodes.synopsis: Steven joins his dad's old frat to make some new friends. Lizzie becomes a "little sister" at a sorority. Tina is obsessed with OMC's "How Bizarre."
episodes.title: Rush and Pledge

episodes.synopsis: Steven is fed up with TDZ in more ways than one. He quits, but it is not without repercussions.
episodes.title: Hell Week

episodes.synopsis: The boys play a scripted game of Truth or Dare to help their chances with the girls.
episodes.title: Truth or Dare

episodes.synopsis: The status of Steven and Lizzie's relationship is up in the air. Lloyd tries to help both Marshall and Steven with their girl troubles.
episodes.title: The Day After

episodes.synopsis: Steven's high school friend Theo shows up to visit just as Steven is planning a perfect date with Lizzie to make him look better than Eric.
episodes.title: The Perfect Date

episodes.synopsis: Hal has an affair with head RA Hillary, and Lucien takes out his anger on Steven. Marshall starts dating a Japanese girl who can's speak English.
episodes.title: Hal and Hillary

episodes.synopsis: Eric heads to UNEC to try to win Lizzie back. The boys watch Girls Gone Wild while the girls try to highlight Lizzie's hair, but fail miserably.
episodes.title: Eric's POV

video.title: Undeclared
video.synopsis: Welcome to college life as seen through the eyes of Steven Karp, a dorky freshman determined to reinvent himself at a new school.
